## Spark Access Issue

**Problem**: Unable to access GitHub Copilot Spark feature

### Error Message Received
```
Spark is currently only available to Copilot Pro+ and Enterprise users.
```

### Your GitHub Copilot Subscription
- [ ] Copilot Individual/Free
- [ ] Copilot Pro (paid $10/month)
- [ ] Copilot Business (organization)
- [ ] Copilot Enterprise
- [ ] Not sure

- [ ] No, I'll check it first

---

**Note**: This repository cannot directly fix GitHub Copilot subscription issues. This template helps:
1. Document the issue for GitHub Support
2. Provide workarounds while troubleshooting
3. Track if multiple users have similar issues

For account-specific Copilot issues, please also contact:
- GitHub Support: https://support.github.com
- Select "Copilot" as the topic
